title: Kim Kardashian reveals her curves and toned abs in a tight two-piece outfit for Ulta visit
text:
Kim Kardashian has celebrated her 39th birthday in true mogul style—with a brand partnership.

She stopped by one of her new KKW Beauty displays, at an Ulta in Calabasas, on Tuesday.

The reality TV star wore a showstopping outfit of a snakeskin crop top and a figure-hugging black skirt, as she helped shoppers choose beauty products.

Showstopper: Kim Kardashian stopped by one of her new displays, at an Ulta in Calabasas, on Tuesday and wore a showstopping outfit of a snakeskin top and a figure-hugging black skirt

Her long-sleeve top and an asymmetrical neckline and came just below her chest.

It seemed she was wearing a new pair of her solution wear, SKIMS, beneath her skirt, as it was semi-sheer.

Earlier in the day she shared herself in upcoming, double-bonded pieces from her brand. The skirt was cinched near her left knee and also had an asymmetrical hem.

Kim paired the look with black strapping heels, with the shorts point under the arch.

I spy SKIMS: It seemed she was wearing a new pair of her solution wear, SKIMS, beneath her skirt, as it was semi-sheer. Earlier in the day she shared herself in upcoming, double-bonded pieces from her brand

Glam: Her look was full glam, in perfect contoured and rosey cheeks, winged liner and a glossy nude lip

Big deal: The sale of KKW Beauty with Ulta, will likely be very lucrative for the star and comes months after Kylie Jenner began selling Kylie Cosmetics with the beauty retailer and is the only continuous brick and mortar locations for both

The rest of the mother-of-four's look was a sleek look. Her hair was parted in the middle and tied into a low, long ponytail. She teamed her look with large gold hoop earrings but no other accessories, though her phone was in her hands.

Her look was full glam, in perfect contoured and rosey cheeks, winged liner and a glossy nude lip.

Inside the store she was snapped looking at her brand's display, where she shared more on Instagram.

She shared videos admiring her products in the store and promising more products to come in the future.

Here and now: She shared videos admiring her products in the store and promising more products to come in the future

Kim was filmed talking with customers who wanted to buy her products and she took to instructing them how to apply perfect lip liner. She suggested wearing a lip liner darker than the lipstick shade to create more definition.

The sale of KKW Beauty with Ulta, will likely be very lucrative for the star and comes months after Kylie Jenner began selling Kylie Cosmetics with the beauty retailer.

Announced back in August, the October 20 launch of Kim's products marks the first time they are sold in person and off her KKW site.

After the trip the mogul went home and showed her 149 million Insta followers gifts she received for her birthday, which was on Monday.

I can help: Kim was filmed talking with customers who wanted to buy her products and she took to instructing them how to apply perfect lip line

Kim to the rescue: She suggested wearing a lip liner darker than the lipstick shade to create more definition and she helped them find shades they liked

Lucky timing: She helped the two customers spotted looking at the products on her trip

Her makeup artist Mario Dedivanovic send her a jeweled clutch, shaped and colored like a lemon slice.

But Kim couldn't hold on and dropped the bag while filming, she said 'Mario...don't kill me,' when the bag would not close after the fall.

Clutches must be on trend because her close friend Tracy Romulus gave her clutches, one shaped like a hot dog in a bun, and covered with stones.

Close friend Larsa Pippen sent over a very bright, roped diamond chain.

Gifted: Her makeup artist Mario Dedivanovic send her a jeweled clutch, shaped and colored like a lemon slice

uhoh: But Kim couldn't hold on and dropped the bag while filming

The 'original influencer,' as she has been dubbed, celebrated her big day with a family dinner and trip to Palm Springs.

Sharing a sultry selfie, Kim delightedly said the caption: 'Thank you so much for all of the birthday love! I had the best most relaxing birthday ever! I Spent the weekend w my amazing friends in Palm Springs and then had a family dinner at my house tonight thrown by my mom and Kanye.

'My favorite Armenian restaurant Carousel came and catered and then was surprised with a beignet truck and churro stand! I got amazing gifts from my whole family and Kanye for me the most amazing bags. But he donated $1 million to my favorite charities that work so hard on prison reform on my behalf from him and the kids. This makes my heart so happy!'

Sorry: She said 'Mario...don't kill me,' when the bag would not close after the fall

Expensive wiener: Clutches must be on trend because her close friend Tracy Romulus gave her clutches, one shaped like a hot dog in a bun, and covered with stones

In honour of her birthday, Kim also revealed that her husband Kanye West and their kids donated $1 million to prison reform charities in her name.

Kim revealed the six-figure donation towards the end of the night, by sharing a 'certificate of donation in honor of Kim Kardashian West.' From Kanye and their four children, North, six, Saint, three, Chicago, 21-months and Pslam, five-months.

The donation was made to prisoner reform organizations Cut 50, Buried Alive Project, Equal Justice Initiative and Antic-Recidivism Coalition.

Part of the collection: The hot dog seemed to be part of a collection as Kim grabbed it off a shelf near a large hamburger clutch, a smaller burger and a popcorn holder, all covered in diamonds and jewels

Close friend Larsa Pippen sent over a very bright, roped diamond chain

Serving body: Kim also celebrated with a cake in the shape of her perfume bottle, gifted by Alexander Wang
description:
Kim Kardashian has celebrated her 39th birthday, like a boss, with a major partnership launch.
She stopped by one of her new displays, at an Ulta in Calabasas, on Tuesday.
